original: @45b * // dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @45b * // dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: gang las kyang rnam par rgyal bar 'dod pa'i don sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par manda la dang me tog dang mchod pa'i yod byad rdzogs par byas te /
analyzed: gang las kyang rnam par rgyal bar 'dod pa'i don sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par manda la dang me tog dang mchod pa'i yod byad rdzogs par byas te /
translated: The practitioner who wishes to accomplish the aim of being victorious in every way, endowed with the commitments, should prepare in a pleasing place the complete articles for worship, such as mandārava flowers and other offerings.

original: khrus la sogs pa bya ba'i rim pa rnams byas la /
analyzed: khrus la sogs pa bya ba'i rim pa rnams byas la /
translated: Having performed the stages of bathing and so forth,

original: h'um las byung ba'i khro bo padma 'khyil pa sku mdog dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa be con dang sdigs mdzub tsan gyi phyag rgya can du rnam pa blta ste /
analyzed: h'um las byung ba'i khro bo padma 'khyil pa sku mdog dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa be con dang sdigs mdzub tsan gyi phyag rgya can du rnam pa blta ste /
translated: one should visualize the wrathful Padmavitika, arisen from hūṃ, red in color, with one face and two hands, holding a club and a threatening mudrā.

original: sngags 'di yid kyis brgyan rtsa brgyad brjod na 'jig rten pa'i mna' las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngags 'di yid kyis brgyan rtsa brgyad brjod na 'jig rten pa'i mna' las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one recites this mantra mentally eight times, one will be victorious in worldly oaths.

original: aom su badzr'a ya h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a zhes par nges par 'grub bo //
analyzed: aom su badzr'a ya h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a zhes par nges par 'grub bo //
translated: Om svāhā to Subhadra, hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ! This is definitely accomplished.

original: mna' las rnam par rgyal ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: mna' las rnam par rgyal ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sādhana of being victorious in oaths is complete.
